shelfButtonInfos.label: keyTangent -global -... -global -ott step;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the step mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: keyTangent -global -...-global -ott spline;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the spline mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: keyTangent -global -...global -ott linear;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the linear mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: animCurveEditor -edi...Infinity -poi cycle;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: animCurveEditor -edi... -poi cycleRelative;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle with offset mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: animCurveEditor -edi...nfinity -poi linear;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the linear mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: animCurveEditor -edi...inity -pri constant;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the constant mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: source easyEasyEase....ce easyEasyEase.mel;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set easy in and easy out.
